sources.name: ProductSource
sources.script:
source(output(
		ProductID as string,
		Name as string,
		ProductNumber as string,
		Color as string,
		StandardCost as decimal(10,0),
		ListPrice as string,
		Size as string,
		Weight as string,
		ProductCategoryID as string,
		ProductModelID as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: false,
	validateSchema: false) ~> ProductSource

transformations.name: PivotRedBlackCosts
transformations.script:
ProductSource pivot(groupBy(Size= iif(isNull(Size) || Size == 'NULL','NA',Size)),
	pivotBy(Color, ['Red']),
	CostSum = sum(StandardCost),
	columnNaming: '$N$V',
	lateral: true) ~> PivotRedBlackCosts

transformations.name: Unpivot1
transformations.script:
PivotRedBlackCosts unpivot(output(
		Color as string,
		CostSumRed as decimal(NaN,0)
	),
	ungroupBy(Size),
	lateral: true,
	ignoreNullPivots: false) ~> Unpivot1
